Shareholder Name: Nafee Nasser Abdul Aziz Al Sorayai
Mohamed Nasser Abdul Aziz Al Sorayai

Description: Al Sorayai Trading and Industrial Group (known as: Al Sorayai) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2010. Al Sorayai operates within the Consumer Durables and Apparel sector focusing on Home Furnishings. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, Singapore, United States and Belgium. Al Sorayai is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 2007.
Company Name: Al Sorayai Trading and Industrial Group (1213)
